description.para: The graphite module provides a simple way to push data into reconnoiter via the carbon-relay or carbon-c-relay. Simply configure the relay to write to the provided port.

checkconfig.parameter: Specify the port which this check listens on. Carbon relay or carbon-c-relay should be configured to send plain text metrics to this port.
The max number of rows to process in one event loop. Defaults to 100. Turn this up higher if you have very high volume metric collection.

example.title: Ingesting graphite data
example.para: The carbon relay config example above will direct any metrics starting "mydata.foo" at the broker:2003 for ingestion
example.programlisting: <noit> <modules> <module image="graphite" name="graphite"/> </modules> <checks> <check uuid="1b4e28ba-2fa1-11d2-893f-e9b761bde3fb" module="graphite" target="127.0.0.1" period="60000" timeout="30000"> <config><listen_port>2003</listen_port></config> </check> </checks> </noit>
